main event: Two lights moved across the sky in Atlantic, Iowa, on August 8, 1956.
interesting points: The lights disappeared and then reappeared during the observation., The lights moved erratically without any sound or visible trail., The observation lasted for about 6 minutes., There were 4 reported by the sighting but confirmed by 2 separate witnesses., Evaluation of the event was not possible due to insufficient data.
witness description: Two separate witnesses observed the lights.
